title: Mongols faciliting diffusion of Chinese inventions

content.prompt: Which of the following statements is accurate about the Mongols during the 1200s and 1300s?

choices.label: The Mongols suppressed Islamic and Buddhist religious practices.
The Mongols facilitated the diffusion of many Chinese inventions.
The Mongols led successful naval invasions of Japan.
